bug.short_desc: Please ship gssproxy configuration snippet with NFS server
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
The snippet in question can be found at https://pagure.io/gssproxy/blob/master/f/proxy/examples/24-nfs-server.conf.in The syntax for these files is documented in `man gssproxy.conf`, and is relatively stable.
It should be installed at /etc/gssproxy/24-nfs-server.conf in fc26+. gssproxy provides the /etc/gssproxy directory. gssproxy will reload its configuration on SIGHUP.
Going forward, we will try to move this configuration out of the gssproxy tree and into the NFS tree upstream.
Thanks!
gssproxy-0.7.0-3 doesn't ship the NFS config snippet (f25, f26, f27).
nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2174db6c24
nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2d8a2eb4cf

By checking related packages, this update has been included in target versions.
[chunwang@fs-qe 1431272]$ for rpm_file in $(ls .);do echo $rpm_file; rpm -qpl $rpm_file 2>/dev/null | grep 24- ; done nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc25.x86_64.rpm /etc/gssproxy/24-nfs-server.conf nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc26.x86_64.rpm /etc/gssproxy/24-nfs-server.conf nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc27.x86_64.rpm /etc/gssproxy/24-nfs-server.conf

nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2174db6c24

nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2d8a2eb4cf
nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
nfs-utils-2.1.1-3.rc1.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
*** Bug 1440411 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
